text: Aleksey Ivanovich Lebed (; 14 April 1955 â€“ 27 April 2019) was a Russian military officer and politician. He was a member of United Russia. He served as the Head of the Republic of Khakassia from 1997 to 2009. He was born in Novocherkassk. Lebed died of internal bleeding on 27 April 2019 in Moscow. He was 64. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from hemorrhage Category:Russian military people Category:Russian politicians Category:Khakassia
title: Aleksey Lebed
